name: House Hippos: A Canadian Media Literacy PSA TTRPG
name_original: House Hippos: A Canadian Media Literacy PSA TTRPG
description:
I made a joke on Twitter that a ttrpg based on house hippos would be funny, and I couldn't get it out of my head so I made a one-page ttrpg about it. Enjoy!

2 or more players, all you need is one GM and as many additional players as you want, plus one D6, and your IMAGINATIONS

I hope this brings you and your players some goofy fun - have a great day!
